definition: to promise/to agree to do sth
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: The young man bowed his head and bent over his ledger again.
sentences.chinese: 那個年輕人點頭應諾，然後又埋頭寫起分類帳。

sentences.english: "Is" brocade it smell the speech noding to agree.
They cannot readily agree to it.
sentences.chinese: 他們不能對此馬上作出應諾。
他的應諾就是我們的保證。

sentences.english: I don't remember I ever promised that.
sentences.chinese: 我不記得我曾應諾過這件事。
他的應諾就是我們的保證。
